Package ghost

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ambusher
    A type of ghost which targets the grid space 4 units ahead of the direction Waka is travelling in.
    App
    Subclass of PApplet used to run the game with processing.
    Chaser
    A type of ghost which directly targets and chases Waka.
    Fruit
    A fruit is an object which must be collected by Waka.
    GameManager
    The game engine which processes all the logic of the game.
    GameObject
    An abstract class which is the superclass that all objects in the game extend from.
    Ghost
    An abstract class for which the types of ghost extend from.
    Ignorant
    A type of ghost which in chase mode, only targets Waka if he is more than 8 units away (straight line distance).
    Map
    A class which contains a collection of methods used to convert the map file into all the objects in the game.
    Movable
    An abstract class that all movable objects extend from.
    SuperFruit
    A type of fruit that has a special property - when collected by Waka, all ghosts become frightened for a period of time set by the config file.
    Waka
    The main player of the game.
    Wall
    A wall object which prevents Waka and ghosts from passing through.
    Whim
    A type of ghost which pairs itself with a chaser.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Ghost.Mode
    enum containing the possible Ghost modes.
    Movable.Direction
    enum containing all the possible directions that a movable object could be travelling in.
